name: A creepy necklace with a red eyeball
data: It increases the users strength pathetically.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users wisdom slightly.
It decreases the users intelligence slightly.
It has nice armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'double thrust'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'thrust'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'backstab'.
